StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Total 2 years of working experience in Cloud Technologies, Big Data, Analytics & Devops domain. ? Working experience in Public Cloud platforms (Azure, GCP, Alibaba) ? Experience in Azure Cloud platform and it's services (Azure VM, Virtual Machines Scale Sets, Azure Functions, Azure SQL Database, Azure Monitor, Virtual Network) ? Experience with Microsoft Power Platform (Microsoft's PowerApps, Power Automate & Power BI) and Microsoft Security tools (Microsoft Information Protection). ? Experience in business analysis and requirements gathering, design and implementing solutions

PositionHistory.Title: Business, Planner
PositionHistory.Description: Microsoft Power Platforms(Power Apps, Power Bi, Power Automate) Tasks and Responsibilities Installing and Configuration of Azure VMs. Configuration of Azure AD Connect Server with Azure AD Pass through Authentication Agent Server. Microsoft Teams Deployment with in-built applications. Microsoft Information Protection deployment with its labels & policies. Developed Canvas Visitor Management User's App on Microsoft's Power Platform using PowerApps & Power Automate. Developed Model Driven Visitor management admin app on Power Apps. Developed flow models on Power Automate for Automatic process. Developed AI model for text recognition with Power Apps AI Builder. Configured Power BI tabs for SCCM data in Microsoft Teams. Power BI Reports Modeling Created end user SOP's of Office 365, Microsoft Teams, One Drive for Business, Planner, Yammer, Forms etc.
